Title: Amoxicillin

Actors: Josh Thomas, Debra Lawrance, David Roberts, Renee Lim
Plot: Knowing full well about Arnold in Josh's life, Ben, who is in the hospital and has been having a rough time with his health of late, lets Josh know that he wants to continue seeing him, ...
